docs.snippet: Law enforcement experts and some victim advocates for children used as sex workers say permanently shutting down what prosecutors call an online brothel could have unintended consequences....

docs.snippet: Shares of Panera Bread surged to a record high on Wednesday and were on track for the biggest one-day move in almost two years after the company gave an upbeat forecast and said technology investments at its restaurants were paying off....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shares of Panera Bread surged to a record high on Wednesday and were on track for the biggest one-day move in almost two years after the company gave an upbeat forecast and said technology investments at its restaurants were paying off.

headline.main: Panera Surges to Record as Wall Street Eyes Payoff From Technology

docs.snippet: Organizers of the 2022 Ryder Cup in Rome will have to find new funds or risk losing the event after the president of the Italian Senate on Wednesday stripped off an amendment to a bill that would have provided a guarantee of 97 million euros ($103...
docs.lead_paragraph: Organizers of the 2022 Ryder Cup in Rome will have to find new funds or risk losing the event after the president of the Italian Senate on Wednesday stripped off an amendment to a bill that would have provided a guarantee of 97 million euros ($103 million).

headline.main: Organizers Lose Guarantee for 2022 Ryder Cup Funds
headline.print_headline: Organizers Lose Guarantee for 2022 Ryder Cup Funds

docs.snippet: A fistfight on the Senate floor involving two Southern "gentlemen" gave rise to Rule 19, the arcane Senate directive that Republicans used more than a century later to silence Democratic Sen. Elizabeth Warren. GOP lawmakers rebuked Warren Tuesday ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A fistfight on the Senate floor involving two Southern "gentlemen" gave rise to Rule 19, the arcane Senate directive that Republicans used more than a century later to silence Democratic Sen. Elizabeth Warren. GOP lawmakers rebuked Warren Tuesday night for speaking against colleague and Attorney General-nominee Jeff Sessions.

headline.main: 1902 Fistfight Gave Rise to Arcane Rule That Silenced Warren
headline.print_headline: 1902 Fistfight Gave Rise to Arcane Rule That Silenced Warren
